column4: does anybody know how I can fix this ./rocknes: error while loading shared libraries: liballeg-3.9.34.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
none it worked before
now it doesn't
install liballegro
there's different package names, find them in synaptic
maybe version mismatch.
install the version of the library that it wants or compile against the version you've got
which <command>  gives you the location of the executable
but I search for bittorrent it s ays /usr/share/bittorrent I go into that directory nothing is in there
are you talking about the default bittorrent client that gnome uses?  that's gnome-btdownload  use   which gnome-btdownload  to find the executable
i cant find it
what does   which gnome-btdownload   give you?   and what are you trying to accomplish?
lost my default bittorrent client when I open a torrent file in firefox
that command gives me nothing
are you in kubuntu?   afaik gnome-btdownload is installed by default in ubuntu.
i know I am in ubuntu
so  sudo aptitude install gnome-btdownload  maybe
never mind found the problem
the interface was uninstalled or something
thanks anyways :0
